title: Russia unleashes strikes against Ukraine; Kyiv targets Crimea bridge
description: Moscow and Kyiv step up retaliatory attacks as Ukraine seeks to dislodge Russian forces in the country's south and east.

title: Is this the end of Imran Khan’s political career in Pakistan?
description: Former Pakistani leader has been convicted of corruption and barred from elections for five years.

title: Arsenal beats Man City in penalty shootout to win Community Shield
description: The Gunners beat City 4-1 in a penalty shootout after a 1-1 draw at Wembley Stadium.

title: Niger coup: Divisions as ECOWAS military threat fails to play out
description: As a deadline to restore Niger’s democratic government passes, strong ECOWAS reaction to Niger coup now appears divided.

title: Justice for the Beirut blast can help avert Lebanon’s collapse
description: Holding the Lebanese political elite to account can be the first step towards the country's recovery.

title: At least 24 people killed in bus crash in Morocco
description: An investigation into the cause of the accident has been opened, authorities say.

title: Thousands in Niger rally in support of coup leaders
description: An estimated 30,000 people gather at a stadium, some with Russian flags, as the threat of military intervention looms.

title: Libya’s High State Council elects new leader as political gridlock deepens
description: The Tripoli-based governing body chooses Mohammed Takala as leader in a run-off by 67 votes to 62.

title: Photos: Rescue operations under way after train derails in Pakistan
description: Several cars of a Hazara Express train derailed and some overturned near Nawabshah in southern Pakistan.

title: Musk says fight with Zuckerberg will be livestreamed on X
description: The social media moguls have been trading comments over a potential mixed martial arts cage match since June.

title: Israel forces kill 3 Palestinians in occupied West Bank attack
description: Soldiers opened fire at a vehicle and killed three passengers near the Jenin refugee camp.

title: South Africa’s coach calls for more support after historic World Cup run
description: Desiree Ellis calls for government and sponsors to help Banyana Banyana push on and professionalise after World Cup run.

title: At least two killed, dozens missing in shipwrecks off Italy’s coast
description: Italian coastguard says it has recovered two bodies and rescued 57 people after two boats sink off island of Lampedusa.

title: Pakistan’s Imran Khan jailed: Is it the end of his political career?
description: Khan's political party is now appealing the ruling which bans the former prime minister from politics for five years.

title: Sweden knock out Women’s World Cup holders USA in wild penalty shootout
description: Two-time defending champions USA make earliest ever World Cup exit, as Sweden progress to face Japan in quarter-finals.

title: More than dozen killed after train derails in southern Pakistan
description: At least 15 people have been killed following the accident near Nawabshah, the country's railways minister says.

title: Musk says X to fund legal bills if users ‘unfairly treated’ over posts
description: The billionaire says platform will fund the legal bills of users treated unfairly by employers for posts on the site.

title: ‘A breath of fresh air’: Nigeria’s World Cup run sparks joy back home
description: As a last-16 clash with England beckons, Nigeria's Women's World Cup run has thrilled a crisis-hit country.

title: Gymnastics: Simone Biles dazzles in first competition since Tokyo Olympics
description: Four-time Olympic champion Biles makes a triumphant return in Chicago two years after pulling out of Tokyo Olympics.

title: Jake Paul wins unanimous decision against Nate Diaz in boxing bout
description: Paul, a 26-year-old social media YouTube personality, beat the 38-year-old former UFC fighter making his pro boxing debu

title: Slovenia suffers its worst-ever floods
description: Devastating floods kill three people and destroy roads, bridges and houses, affecting two thirds of Slovenian territory.

title: Record floods ravage Slovenia, PM calls it ‘worst’ disaster in its history
description: The small Alpine nation experienced devastating floods over Friday and Saturday that killed three people.

title: How toys comforted children fleeing Turkey-Syria earthquake
description: Children displaced by the February disaster told Al Jazeera about the toys they brought with them.

title: India’s Chandrayaan-3 space mission enters moon’s orbit
description: India's space agency says its spacecraft has successfully been inserted into the lunar orbit.

title: China accused of using water cannon on Philippine boat in South China Sea
description: Philippines Armed Forces condemns Chinese Coast Guard's 'excessive' and 'dangerous' actions in disputed waters.

title: In scorching, earthquake-ravaged Hatay, water shortages lead to illnesses
description: Authorities, however, point to widespread destruction, low funds and dwindling outside help as obstacles to their work.

title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 529
description: These are the main developments as the Russian full-scale invasion of Ukraine enters its 529th day.

title: Blood bank, university hit as Russia, Ukraine intensify attacks
description: Moscow and Kyiv's forces escalate attacks as 40 countries gather in Saudi Arabia to discuss peace in Ukraine.

title: Defiance, fear in Niger as ECOWAS deadline looms
description: ECOWAS ultimatum for Niger coup leaders to restore deposed president or risk intervention is set to expire on Sunday.
